reviews.review:
Go play Opposing Force instead

jokes aside, Blue Shift feels the weakest of the official Half Life franchise. No new concepts, weapons, aliens, or really anything. It feels like a small addition to Half Life that really doesn't bring anything new to the table. Its also considerably shorter than Half Life or Opposing Force. To hardcore Half Life fans, not much lore wise is even brought up other than stuff you would've assumed. The $.99 price tag isn't that bad, but you get more out of OF. But the expansion it self isn't bad. Same fun arcadey shooter with a unique world. 



Valve please add a mixed recommendation

I guess it could be a fun companion to the first game but it's been super glitchy and I can't play for more than 5 minutes before something stops working.

EDIT: I'm not really sure what was different this time, but I was able to complete the game with minimal glitching. Every time a save loads from death I would be unstoppably discharging whichever weapon I had, but I found a workaround (selecting crowbar and then re-loading, for whatever reason, worked). I still wouldn't really recommend the game, it didn't feel quite as exciting as Opposing Force.
Aspero ♥.

Uma ótima expansão para matar a  saudades de um clássico, bom pelo menos no meu caso. Ano passado zerei todos os( Half Lifes) principais e deixei as duas expansões do primeiro jogo para depois, bom a hora chegou e bateu a nostalgia dessa saga incrível.

Blue Shift ira controlar  o segurança  Barney Calhoun e braço direito do Gordon Freeman, no jogo você irá descobrir como ele escapou da Black Mesa e ajudou  outros a escapar incluindo o Dr. Rosemberg. 

Gráficos: Bonitos levando em consideração a época.
Jogabilidade: Muito Boa.
Bugs: Sempre que eu carregava um load a arma ficava atirando sozinha até acabar a munição ou trocar pra outro.

Acho que o único defeito dessa dlc é que ela é curta e tem pouca variedade de armas.

Nota:
8/10

En avance sur son temps Half-Life Blue Shift et Half-Life en General est un must have.
Graphisme vieux mais toujours agreable a voir, voix francaise bien realisé et scenario plutot bon a joué. 
Les defauts sont minimes face a la qualité de ces jeux mais sont quand même present.
Le level design ce ressemble trés assez souvent et le jeux ce termine en quelques heures a peine. 
Je dirais qu'il faudrait absolument avoir le Valve Pack pour finir tout ces jeux de qualités.
plays as barney and every other cop in this game is barney 10/10
Kult Game
BARNEY ;W;

Compared to the rest of the franchise, it's a little underwhelming. No new weapons, no new enemies, new HD models that a few people actually use and a short storyline, took me like 2-3 hours to beat. 
But otherwise, a fine addition to the Half-Life 1 trilogy. It's pretty cheap and if you still want to play something in the HL universe, it's a fun game to quickly run through.

Шикарное дополнение к основной игре, денег не жалко за это отдать, сюжет и геймплей на уровне, как и всегда.

gitarowa

This game is so much better than original Half life in my opinion. It's also funny how people call this game too short, while it's a stand-alone expansion, compared to nowadays expansions (Dlcs) this one is lenghty.

+ Level design is for the most part good.
+ I think combat is somehow better than HL1, human enemies are not as bad as in HL1, shooting feels much more fun somehow.
+ It features some same moments from HL1, it fits perfectly. The difference is you see it from other character's perspective, which is really cool.

- Xen levels. Yuk
- Why Barney does not speak? He's not Gordon Freeman you know... He speaks in other games...
- Same with HL1 this game is sometimes hard to figure out there to go, so had to check walkthrough time to time.
- Fall damage is way too big and it starts counting from way too small height drop.
- The beginning is so slow, for most part just same as HL1, in HL1 it was fine, because it was for the first time, but here it just feels as repeating same thing. It's boring, atleast it's about 10 minutes long only.


7/10

Krótka, bo na ok 2h "dodatek" do Half Life, 
aczkolwiek interesująca ukazuje zdarzenia
z Black Mesy, słynny "Resonance Cascade"
tyle że od strony Ochroniarza B.Calhouna, 
a raczej Barneya.

Dodatek jest wart ogrania, a swoją długością 
na pewno zachęca weekendowych graczy do 
zagrania w nią nie martwiąc się o brak czasu.

You play as Barney Calhoun in Half-Life: Blue Shift now this expansion of Half-Life is a mess with glitches, but i'm not saying it's bad or good. I'm saying it's a decent expansion of Half-Life as there's not a lot of weapons you can use in Blue Shift like you can in Half-Life & Opposing Force. The interesting thing about this is level designs I love the designs in Half-Life, Opposing Force, & Blue Shift. So if you want the full Half-Life 1 experience get Blue Shift with Opposing Force & Half-Life. Opposing Force you play as Adrian Shepard & in Half-Life you play as Gordon Freeman. Have Fun to experience Barney Calhoun's point of view of the resonance cascade.
2 horas de gameplay e ja era, triste

Well, unlike Opposing force this expansion kind of falls flat in my, and apparently many others opinions. It feels very samey with Half-Life, and it has a plethora of unintuitive puzzles that just kill the flow of the game, things like putting ladders in pitch black areas with dark textures that are required to find in order to progress, things that normal players wouldn't be able to just figure out without googling it. And this is a minor nitpick, but the story was so. Predictable. However, the Old black Mesa labs just before that short Xen level was pleasing, I loved the aesthetics of it, too bad there wasn't much of it to explore after you beat the Xen level. All in all, I rate blue shift at a 6/10. Good but not great.
Half-Life Derim Susarım. 10/10

Do i recommend this game?
yes
however, it's just too short. Calling it an expansion pack is a little absurd. It presents itself much like Halflife and Halflife: Opposing Force with puzzles and fire fights but lacks in content. I beat the other expansion (Opposing Force) in roughly 6 hours where it only took me about 2 hours and some change to complete Blue Shift. It also doesn't have much of the new weapons that were introduced in Opposing Force or a strong finale and end cut scene. These are nit-picks but would still have been appreciated if added to the game. Luckily the game is borderline free right now time and was nice while it lasted.
Insanely average expansion but not bad I would consider getting this last after half life and opposing force.

If you are going for the full Half-Life experience, I believe the gearbox games are a must. Blue Shift is as others say, classic Half Life through the eyes of Barney Calhoun, but there isn't much wrong with that. While the game is relatively lackluster in comparison to the preceding and following entries, I found Blue Shift to be a low-stress trek through the ever-increasingly complicated halls of Black Mesa.
The game's plot is pretty quick, but hey, it's Barney Calhoun.

Very fun game although short, completely recommend it.

Half-Life'ın güvenlik olarak oynadığımız hali kargaşadan kurtulmaya çalışan Barney Calhon(inşallah yanlış yazmadım :))'u yönettiğimiz oyunda standart oyun hikayesinin yüzeyde kalan kısmını farklı bir bakış açısıyla oynuyoruz denilebilir hikayeye eklemede bulunduğu söylenemez, Half-Life kesmiyorsa şans verilebilir. Zaten Valve complate pack aldıysanız bir bakmanızı öneririm

[h1] Oyun Hakında	[/h1] 
Black Mesa Da Bir Gardiyanız Black Mesada Sadece Freemanın Tek Başına Black Mesayı Kurtarmadığını Gösteren Çok Güzel Yan Oyun

[h1] + Yönleri	[/h1]
[list]
  [*]Atmosferi Çok Güzeldi
  [*]Hikaye Mütişti

[/list]

[/list]
